ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##{{book.durChapterTitle}}|.*作者：.*|\(本章完\)|PS：.*求推荐！|PS：.*求收藏！|.*第.*章.*|感谢.*打赏.*|感谢.*推荐票.*|感谢.*月票.*|（.*月票.*）|（为大家的.*票加更.*）|第二更在.*

bookSourceComment:
海棠默认搜索要两个字以上，请注意❗️
本书源默认搜索是书名！！🔑❗️

不能登录的时候：
需要把源URL和登录URL都换成同个网址。
可使用以下网址:
https://www.htnewbooks.com/
或者
http://www.haitangbook.com

ruleBookInfo.kind:
class.uk-card.1@tag.font.4@text&&class.uk-label@text##(.)攻(.)受##$1$2
<js>
str = String(result);
result = str.replace(/原創/g, '原创')
.replace(/\//g, ',')
.replace(/\[/g, '')
.replace(/\]/g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/.未設置./g, '')
.replace(/強/g, '强')
.replace(/現/g, '现')
.replace(/劇/g, '剧')
.replace(/結/g, '结')
.replace(/連載中/g, '连载')
.replace(/纖細/g, '纤细')
.replace(/輕/g, '轻')
.replace(/鬆/g, '松')
.replace(/馬/g, '马')
.replace(/園/g, '园')
.replace(/溫/g, '温')
.replace(/懸/g, '悬')
.replace(/職場/g, '职场')
.replace(/靈異/g, '灵异')
.replace(/種/g, '种')
.replace(/網遊/g, '网游')
.replace(/勵/g, '励')
.replace(/宮/g, '宫')
.replace(/會/g, '会')
.replace(/運動/g, '运动')
.replace(/話/g, '话')
.replace(/俠/g, '侠')
.replace(/羅/g, '罗')
.replace(/視/g, '视')
.replace(/帥/g, '帅');
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: class.uk-card.0@tag.h4.0@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>
##<.*?mages/fullcolor.png.*?>
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰[\s\S]+?此章节需要购买[\s\S]+?💰##请刷新正文看彩蛋
